QuestData.Title: Breaking Down Barriers
QuestData.Description:
As I suspected, Stitchflesh's assistants are carrying on his work. Whatever they're building, we need to destroy it.
They've secured the chamber with a soul barrier and several bile spewers. We must find a way through!
Thales said he may have a suggestion.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a way past the Soul Barrier.
QuestData.RewardText: It seems these kyrian are more stalwart than I expected. Let us avenge their fallen kin.
